alert.note: Alert for Atascosa (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 9:07AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Atascosa County through 945 AM CDT... At 907 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Campbellton, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pleasanton, Jourdanton, Poteet, Coughran, Dobrowolski and McCoy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
